translations.chinese: 於是諸侯王及 太尉長安侯臣綰等三百人，與博士稷嗣君叔孫通謹擇良日二月甲午，上尊號。
translations.english: So the feudal lords and Grand Marshal Lord Chang'an Chen Wan and 300 others, together with Erudite Ji, Successor Lord Shu Sun Tong, carefully chose an auspicious day, the jiawu day of the second month, and presented the honored title.

translations.chinese: 漢王即皇帝位于氾水之陽。
translations.english: King Han ascended the imperial throne at Fenshui's northern bank.

translations.chinese: 尊王后曰皇后，太子曰皇太子，追尊先媼曰昭靈夫人。
translations.english: He honored the queen as empress, the crown prince as imperial crown prince, and posthumously honored his late mother as Lady Zhaoling.

translations.chinese: 詔曰：「故衡山王吳芮與子二人、兄子一人，從百粵之兵，以佐諸侯，誅暴秦，有大功，諸侯立以為王。
translations.english: The edict said: "The former King of Hengshan Wu Rui, with two sons and one nephew, led Baiyue troops to assist the feudal lords, executed the violent Qin, had great merit. The feudal lords established him as king.

translations.chinese: 項羽侵奪之地，謂之番君。
translations.english: Xiang Yu invaded and seized his territory, calling him Fan Jun.
